member.name: IDirect3DCubeTexture9.AddDirtyRect
member.summary: Adds a dirty region to a cube texture resource.
member.param: Member of the D3DCUBEMAP_FACES enumerated type, identifying the cube map face.
Pointer to a structure, specifying the dirty region. Specifying NULL expands the dirty region to cover the entire cube texture.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. If the method fails, the return value can be: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL.

member.name: IDirect3DCubeTexture9.GetCubeMapSurface
member.summary: Retrieves a cube texture map surface.
member.param: Member of the D3DCUBEMAP_FACES enumerated type, identifying a cube map face.
Specifies a level of a mipmapped cube texture.
Address of a pointer to an interface, representing the returned cube texture map surface.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. If the method fails, the return value can be: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL.

member.name: IDirect3DCubeTexture9.GetLevelDesc
member.summary: Retrieves a description of one face of the specified cube texture level.
member.param: Specifies a level of a mipmapped cube texture.
Pointer to a D3DSURFACE_DESC structure, describing one face of the specified cube texture level.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. If the method fails, the return value can be: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL.

member.name: IDirect3DCubeTexture9.LockRect
member.summary: Locks a rectangle on a cube texture resource.
member.param: Member of the D3DCUBEMAP_FACES enumerated type, identifying a cube map face.
Specifies a level of a mipmapped cube texture.
Pointer to a D3DLOCKED_RECT structure, describing the region to lock.
Pointer to a rectangle to lock. Specified by a pointer to a structure. Specifying NULL for this parameter expands the dirty region to cover the entire cube texture.

Combination of zero or more locking flags that describe the type of lock to perform. For this method, the valid flags are:
D3DLOCK_DISCARD
D3DLOCK_NO_DIRTY_UPDATE
D3DLOCK_NOSYSLOCK
D3DLOCK_READONLY
You may not specify a subrect when using D3DLOCK_DISCARD. For a description of the flags, see D3DLOCK.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. D3DERR_INVALIDCALL is returned if one or more of the arguments is invalid.

member.name: IDirect3DCubeTexture9.UnlockRect
member.summary: Unlocks a rectangle on a cube texture resource.
member.param: Member of the D3DCUBEMAP_FACES enumerated type, identifying a cube map face.
Specifies a level of a mipmapped cube texture.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. If the method fails, the return value can be: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL.

member.name: IDirect3DCubeTexture9
member.summary: Applications use the methods of the IDirect3DCubeTexture9 interface to manipulate a cube texture resource.
